release_note: General improvements bug fixes. Sports feature updates.
Improved Sports Section Tune directly to games that are on now or watch sports related content on demand and more.
Feature enhancements bug fixes and performance improvements.
The latest version contains an improved user experience with added functionalities like picture in picture updated home screen guide and player experience as well as bug fixes.
Support for multi word searches Added tab for Team Info to Sports page
Faster start up for Live TV and DVR Play all available On Demand episodes
Save your Prime Time Any Time recordings HD icon for HD channels in the guide
Improved Watch Next Correct duration displayed for Live TV Resume IPLL and VOD after putting app in background
Support for iOS 14.5 App Transparency Expanded Sports schedule
Improvements to Watchlist Save PTAT recordings
Faster time to video Favorites only includes favorite channels Sports recordings extended by 60 minutes
iPhone 12 support Closed caption off unless enabled by user Additional VoiceOver capabilities
Faster updates of DVR recordings Favorite teams display first on Sports page Additional VoiceOver coverage
Improved login experience Reduced crash rate More VoiceOver support
Improved login experience Reduced crash rate Reduced buffering Enhanced VoiceOver capabilities
Better playback connection experience Better handling of lost connections Improved video seeking Reduced load times Enhanced VoiceOver capabilities
Improved log in experience Quicker access to recordings Reduced crash rate
Video player improvements Updated privacy policy text Better PTAT Timers and Daily Schedule page response Reduced crashes
We update the app every few weeks to include improvements and address defects.
This update gives the DISH Anywhere app a modern look and feel. We ve also made some improvements to make the app more efficient and stable
The latest version includes bug fixes and general improvements.
Updated Privacy Policy General improvements and bug fixes
Support for iOS 13 and general bug fixes
Bug fixes and customer experience improvements
Bug Fixes. We are tuned into you.
We have released an auto play feature so you can binge watch your favorite On Demand TV shows non stop. Bug fixes because we re tuned in to you.
Bug Fixes. Always trying to improve.
DISH Anywhere is now available in Spanish. Change your phone s default language to Spanish and watch your World Cup games live. Bug fixes and a few updates we are listening to you .
Single Signon Support for TV Providers View and Play Purchased Movies

We ve added a new way to log in using Single Sign On to integrate with TV Providers apps. We also added the ability to view and play movies purchased on DISH Anywhere web browsers or DISH Hopper s. We also have included bug fixes.
Improved iPhone X support plus general fixes and stability improvements. We are constantly working to improve your experience. Thanks for using DishAnywhere!
Bug Fixes and improved overall functionality.
iOS 10 support IPv6 support Bug Fixes
Kids Profile! Create an age appropriate profile for your children to watch their favorite DVR On Demand and Transferred content. On Demand : quickly scroll by alphabet. Bug fixes.

New Home screen makes it easier to find content to watch quickly Catch all the football action this season live or recorded on your iPhone Support for Guide Sports screens for all DISH subscribers including receivers that aren t Sling enabled DVR categories and On Demand screens load faster Bug fixes

Use your iPhone to control any TV in your house with added support for your Joeys Know where your service technician is with the Where s My Tech feature More content to watch with the addition of Disney and Showtime On Demand content

You can now use multiple profiles with the same DISH account. Each profile contains personalized recommendations Favorites Watchlists and more. Forgot your login info No problem! Use the new Hopper pairing feature when you re at home. Sports fans view scores results in the NCAA basketball tournament bracket. Pay your bill inside the app from Settings Pay My Bill requires login . Resume watching programs automatically when interrupted by a phone call. Other bug fixes and refinements.

Completely redesigned look and feel. Flip your phone horizontally or vertically while streaming to change viewing mode. View Recommended programs personalized for you based on your viewing history. Use Recents to quickly resume videos you recently watched. Watchlist allows you to quickly access and keep track of your favorite programs. See what s most popular in your area or nationwide with the What s Hot feature in Guide Gallery. Scroll down on the new media page to view program availability across Guide DVR and On Demand. New remote control allows you to control your DISH receiver from your iPhone. Hopper customers can also turn on your TV and control its volume.
Fix for On Demand streaming due to iOS8 update. Other bug fixes.

Due to iOS8 update trying to watch On Demand programs will crash the application. We are aware of this issue and will update Dish Anywhere with the fix as soon as we can. Go to More Sports tab to see live scores of todays games and what games are coming up later in the week. Follow your favorite team in My Teams section. Other bug fixes.

Watch Univision s live coverage of the FIFA World CupTM June 12th July 13th Fixed bug related to receiver s not displaying or incorrectly showing as offline Fixed issue related to guide showing the wrong time. Other bug fixes

Users can now control their Hopper with an in app remote. You can now use your Facebook Twitter or Google account to log in to DISH Anywhere. Apple Airplay enhancements. Additional optimizations and bug fixes.

Users that have a Hopper with built in Sling technology can now Transfer DVR recordings to your iPhone and watch them anywhere even without an internet connection! You can now set Parental Controls for On Demand Transfers from inside the app. View and manage your iPhone s ability to stream On Demand programs and Transfer content through Authorized Device option in App settings. View Closed Captioning text on Live On Demand and Transferred programs. Additional bug fixes.

Added a new Scrub Bar feature to player controls for Hopper users. You can now easily move to the exact spot on Live TV or DVR recordings. Rotten Tomatoes ratings make it easy to choose what to watch in On Demand and Blockbuster. New Predictive Search feature title recommendations now appear as you type. Age filters in Blockbuster Kids Movies and TV Shows help you make the right content choices for your child. DVR programs can now be filtered by Genre. Additional performance enhancements and bug fixes.

Added ability to Watch On Demand content on your iPhone Share what you re watching with friends via Facebook and Twitter. Reboot your receiver remotely with the Reset button in the Settings My Receivers section DISH users with unsupported receivers may now log in and view On Demand programs. Added Audio Only mode Hopper customers can now change the viewing mode to AO and listen to any channel while having the app in the background. Additional performance enhancements and bug fixes.

Now browse your guide DVR recordings and search screens in landscape mode while streaming. Implemented Reset button to reboot the receiver remotely in the Settings My Receivers section for users that are having connectivity issues . Further performance enhancements. Fixed the issue where Sling Adapter was not being recognized for some users. Additional bug fixes.

Improved the performance stability and reliability of the application Completely redesigned user interface You can now use your Guide DVR Search while streaming in the background Added ability to set and use favorite channels in guide Updated in app remote keypad functionality Took full advantage of the iPhone4s 5 high retina display to show high resolution images Added support for the larger iPhone5 screen

Fixes an issue where some users would get an error that their receivers were offline when trying to view DVR content Added PrimeTime Anytime tab and collapsible channels for users with the Hopper receiver Added application performance and connectivity enhancements
Greatly increases video quality for users with a VIP 722 Dish receiver and a Sling Adapter
Fixes an issue where some users were not able to connect and watch Live TV from their Sling Adapter or 922 receiver. Try pushing the Live TV button if the Watch button is not available.
User interface enhancements Fixes for login issues
Fixes the white screen issue on the iPhone 3G
More stable video viewing User interface enhancements Bug fixes

Watch Your TV Live! Now you can watch your favorite live and recorded content from your ViP 922 receiver right on your phone! It s like carrying your TV around in your pocket watch all of your favorite sports news TV shows and movies from your home receiver anytime anywhere. ViP 922 customers no longer need to purchase the SlingPlayer Mobile application to watch live and recorded TV on their iPhone or iPod touch ! The DISH Remote Access app includes this ability plus the ability to schedule recordings and manage your DVR and is available for FREE! Requires high speed Internet connection to a ViP 922 receiver.
